_metadata.description: Patterns for 77-*-*-* and 77-*-* format matching alphanumeric sections
_metadata.pattern_explanation: Matches 77 followed by 2 or 3 alphanumeric sections separated by dashes
_metadata.structure_requirement: Must have exactly 2 or 3 dashes creating 3 or 4 sections with alphanumeric characters
_metadata.section_content: Each section after 77 contains letters and/or digits
